directions: In a blender, combine the yogurt and frozen berries and blend until the mixture forms a smooth puree. Pour the yogurt mixture into a bowl. Arrange the kiwifruit and strawberries slices on top. Sprinkle with the granola and chia seeds and serve immediately. Serves 1.
ingredients: 1/2 cup (2 oz./60 g) frozen mixed berries
1 kiwifruit, peeled, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise
title: Breakfast Bowl with Fresh Fruit and Granola
